thoughts.text: I need to create a new directory to organize my workspace. I also need to create a plan for how to organize my files.
thoughts.reasoning: Creating a new directory will help me keep my workspace organized. Having a plan for how to organize my files will help me stay focused and efficient.
thoughts.plan:
- Create a new directory
- Plan how to organize files based on type or task
- Move files to appropriate directories
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure that my plan is realistic and not too complicated. I also need to be careful not to over-organize and waste time.
thoughts.speak: I need to create a new directory to organize my workspace and plan how to organize my files based on type or task.
